data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gonzalez, Daniel A. Caceres (2013): Guzmania panamensis (Bromeliaceae) - a new species from Talamanca Mountain in Veraguas province, Western Panama. PhytoKeys 25: 69-74, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.25.5174, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.25.5174
